snippet: In a year in which the league was tarnished by how it handled domestic violence cases, Goodell, the commissioner, earned 1.5 percent less than in 2013.
abstract: NFL releases annual tax filing showing Commissioner Roger Goodell earned $34.1 million in salary, bonus and other compensation, despite controversy over league's handling of domestic violence issues in past year; 2015 is last year in which league will have to make such information public, as it has relinquished its non-profit status.
lead_paragraph: In a year in which the league was tarnished by how it handled domestic violence cases, Goodell, the commissioner, earned 1.5 percent less than in 2013.

headline.main: In N.F.L.’s Trying 2014, Roger Goodell Earned $34.1 Million
headline.print_headline: In a Trying 2014, Goodell Earned $34.1 Million
